text: 38|22|geudeul-i dawis ap-eulo gass-eul ttaegeuga geudeul-eul dulyeowo hani geudeul-i malhagil dulyeowo masiyo jeohuineun ui gyeon-eul dallihaneun dusalam-eulo nuga jalmoshayeossseubnikka jeohuideul-eul jinlilo sseo pandanhayeo jusidoe bujeonghage ma obsigo olh-eun gillo jeohuileul indoha yeo jusoseo
